channel.title: reality on Uncombed Whiskers
channel.description: Recent content in reality on Uncombed Whiskers

item.title: Pivot
item.description: As seasons change and years pass, this old brain needs to learn new tricks to satiate it’s unending craving for solving ambiguous and hard problems. Well, it’s time to feed it the next set of problem fodder, so to speak; with an interesting ‘domain centric’ pivot. Here’s raising one to jumping into the unknown üòâ

item.title: Scratchin & Squeakin
item.description: A friend introduced me to scratch today. I wrote a trivial program with it - A plane falling down on an unassuming unaware kitty, with sound effects of course.

item.title: Us
item.description: In Thud, the dwarf Bashfullsson says ‚ÄúI need no axe to be a dwarf, Nor do I need to hate trolls. What kind of creature defines itself by hatred?‚Äù.
